paragraph: to call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Client-centered Approach
detailsData.content: We prioritize each client's unique concerns and priorities, ensuring a personalized experience.

detailsData.title: Tenacious Advocacy
detailsData.content: We embrace challenges and apply critical, creative thinking to achieve optimal solutions for our clients.

detailsData.title: Pragmatic Solutions
detailsData.content: We deliver concrete answers and durable solutions, focusing on practical and effective outcomes.

address: 12 Gough Street, 2nd Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103
subHeading: Innovative and pragmatic attorneys focused on state and local tax.
valueProp: Focused on state and local tax, Silverstein & Pomerantz attorneys have spent decades litigating many of the nation’s most complex SALT disputes. We’ll bring our experience and commitment to work for you.
CTA: Our clients’ concerns are our concerns. Whether for a controversy, business transaction, or other matter, we look forward to discussing how we can work together.
openHours: Hours may vary, contact for details

testimonalData.text: Silverstein & Pomerantz provided exceptional legal representation and resolved our tax issues efficiently.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Their team's expertise in state and local tax matters is unparalleled. Highly recommended!
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: I was impressed by the dedication and professionalism of Silverstein & Pomerantz. They exceeded my expectations.
testimonalData.author: Alice Johnson
